The BEPS model
17, 18 used in this study is a process-based diagnostic model driven by remotely sensed vegetation parameters, including LAI, clumping index, and land cover type, as well as meteorological and soil data. It simulates photosynthesis, energy balance, and hydrological and soil biogeochemical processes at daily time steps
17, 28 . For GPP simulation, BEPS uses the leaf-level biochemical model
29 with a two-leaf upscaling scheme from leaf to canopy:
